InstalledItem.Name: IonBurst
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

The IonBurst is touted by Lightning Power as being a best-in-class power plant, providing unequaled performance for the price.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Sukoran
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Banu
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Good design always survives with the Banu. The Sukoran shield generator updates Tevarin technology in a number of interesting ways. Its efficient design draws less power, while still effectively producing a robust shield capable of absorbing most ballistic and energy attacks until it's fully depleted. However, this greater efficiency comes with a price as the Sukoran's slower regen rate may temporarily render the shield offline.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: Beacon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has made other mil-spec component manufacturers sit up and take notice with the introduction of the highly praised Beacon quantum drive.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Singe Cannon (S2)
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Banu
Item Type: Tachyon Cannon
Size: 2

Made popular by a Banu souli, the Singe tachyon cannon consistently delivers devastating energy damage across vast distances. Though slow to fire, the lightning-fast tachyon projectile strikes targets almost instantaneously, making the Singe a favorite choice for Banu security ships. Although the Banu have long forgotten the origin of this high tech weapon, several unique design choices have led scholars to suspect that the Banu might have appropriated the tech into their culture, instead of inventing it themselves.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.
